title: Trump news at a glance: layoffs for federal workers begin and president threatens China with tariffs
description: President suggests layoffs will be ‘a lot’ and in Democrat areas as unions for federal workers take the matter to court – key US politics stories from 10 October at a glance
content: Mass firings of US federal workers have begun, as Republicans work to exert pressure on Democrat lawmakers to end a government shutdown. The White House budget office said the layoffs were “substantial”, with unions for federal workers taking the mat... [500 chars]

title: Brit becomes fourth UK EuroMillions ticket-holder this year to scoop jackpot
description: It is the fourth time this year that a UK ticket-holder has won the top prize - as Friday's draw numbers have made one lucky winner £25m richer.
content:
A single ticket-holder has become the winner of a £25m EuroMillions jackpot, The National Lottery has announced.
It marks the fourth time this year that a UK ticket-holder has won the top prize - and the second Friday in a row.
One lucky ticket-holde... [886 chars]

title: A tangled web of deals stokes AI bubble fears in Silicon Valley
description: Some are worried that the rapid rise in the value of AI tech companies may be a bubble waiting to burst.
content:
At OpenAI's DevDaythis week, OpenAI boss Sam Altman did what American tech bosses rarely do these days: he actually answered questions from reporters.
"I know it's tempting to write the bubble story," Mr Altman told me as he sat flanked by his top li... [5511 chars]

title: King's coat of arms to feature on new UK passports
description: The full redesign, coming into effect from December, will be the first since passports turned dark blue after Brexit.
content:
King Charles's coat of arms will feature on the front of all new passports from December, the Home Office has said.
Natural landscapes from all four UK nations will also feature inside the updated documents, including Ben Nevis, the Lake District, Th... [1785 chars]

title: 'Hope in Gaza' and 'Live forever in our hearts, Ricky'
description: The beginning of a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas and the funeral of boxer Ricky Hatton lead Saturday's papers.
